title: "Massive Bio Has Been Awarded a Contract by the NCI to Develop an Oncology Based Artificial Intelligence-Enabled Clinical Trial Recruitment Tool"
excerpt: "Massive Bio, Inc., a leader in precision medicine and artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled patient-centric clinical trial enrollment, announced today it has been awarded a Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) contract by the National Cancer Institute (NCI) to develop and characterize the Deep Learning Clinical Trial Matching System (DLCTMS)."
